name: Palm Beach Pool Deck Plan – 8x16 Deck with 8ft Pool Cutout + Dual Privacy Walls
open_features: 8 ft circular pool cutout (pool designed separately by others)
4×4 posts (SP No.2) on 12×12×12 in concrete footings
Joists: 2×4 SP No.2 @ 12 in O.C. with Simpson H1A hurricane ties
2×12 stair stringers @ 12 in O.C.; stair footing 24×48×4 in depth
Railing: 4×4 posts @ 4 ft O.C.; 2×4 rails with 2×2 pickets ≤4 in gap
Decking: 2×6 composite decking; 1/8 in gap after drying
Dual privacy walls: 2×4 battens vertically spaced, Simpson LPC4Z beam connections
safety_note: This plan illustrates only the deck framing and privacy walls around a pool cutout. The pool, electrical bonding, fencing, alarms, and anti-entrapment systems must be provided by licensed contractors per local code.
